title: Are you really removing Rylai's pet interaction
body:
UNIQUE Passive: Damaging spells and abilities reduce enemy movement speed by 20% for 1 second.

I know for a fact that it will hurt malz and heimer, and I don't have experience on mord but I am pretty sure it will hurt him too.

replies.body: I'm guessing it just falls under Spells and Abilities?
Correct. This change shouldn't impact any pets that previously applied Rylai's (they should have been at 20% for 1s before and will still be after).

Out of curiosity, what champs will need the biggest compensation? 
Morde? Aurelion? Viktor? Twitch?
Ok, maybe not that last one.
The only one that might is Mordekaiser, but it's not as big of a nerf as people think. Just giving him back some(or all please) of his base stats would leave him about the same as where he is now.

and *POOF*

just like that, he's gone
I would say zyra and brand sup but they are really strong right now so maybe they will now just be oke.

I have a related question.  

I was really curious why Yorick's ghouls do not proc spell effects (rylais, liandrys, and Death Fire Touch)?  I thought that DFT would be a great mastery for him similar to Illaoi but it does not proc on his ghouls like it does for every other minion created by a champion in the game as far as I know (zyra, heimer, malzahar, mordekaiser, elise, annie, Ivern all have pets that apply rylais and thus should also apply deathfire touch).  This behavior is really odd and unique to his ghouls/maiden and makes understanding what champion created minions should and shouldn't apply harder to understand.
Rip Azir even more nerfs {{champion:268}}  poor golden pigeon
